name: Adeaca
description: ADEACA transforms project-based business through solutions and services that break down organizational silos and create a boundaryless organization. If projects are the center of your business, such as construction, professional services, aerospace & defense, ETO manufacturing, and whether you call them projects, engagements, jobs, or contracts, you are the center of our business.

locations.address: 3348 Peachtree Rd NE, Tower Place 200, Suite 700
